dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, you are not serious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, you are not serious.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: I am, I really am! Microsoft, uh, they've been busy, apparently protecting American democracy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I am, I really am! Microsoft, uh, they've been busy, apparently protecting American democracy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Microsoft has been active in attempting to shut down attempts to disrupt the midterms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Microsoft? Microsoft is our savior now? Okay. What's the scoop this time? Russia again?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Microsoft? Microsoft is our savior now? Okay. What's the scoop this time? Russia again?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Fancy Bear, you know, the Russian-affiliated group. They've been trying to, like, thwart cyberattacks. And here's the thing, A â€“ they're saying it's mostly aimed at Republican-aligned groups.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Fancy Bear, you know, the Russian-affiliated group. They've been trying to, like, thwart cyberattacks. And here's the thing, A - they're saying it's mostly aimed at Republican-aligned groups.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In its latest tussle with the so-called Fancy Bear group, Microsoft has sought to stymie what it believes are attempts to attack Republican, not Democrat, groups.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Republican? Really? Convenient timing. So, no Democrats, though, right? Just, uh, just the GOP?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Republican? Really? Convenient timing. So, no Democrats, though, right? Just, uh, just the G O P?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Not long after, Senator Claire McCaskill, a Democrat in Missouri, confirmed she'd been a target of the Fancy Bear crew.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they haven't ruled out attacks on Democrats, but the big focus is on places like the International Republican Institute and the Hudson Institute. They're, like, setting up fake websites.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they haven't ruled out attacks on Democrats, but the big focus is on places like the International Republican Institute and the Hudson Institute. They're, like, setting up fake websites.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two targets appeared to be two think tanks: the International Republican Institute and the Hudson Institute. Fake websites designed to mimic the organizations real sites, ostensibly in anticipation of a future cyberattack, were taken down by Microsoft.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Fake websites. Wow, groundbreaking. Is this, uh, is this 2005? What are they even trying to do with these amazing fake websites? Steal credit card numbers?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fake websites. Wow, groundbreaking. Is this, uh, is this two thousand five? What are they even trying to do with these amazing fake websites? Steal credit card numbers?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, they're trying to steal login credentials, for things like Office 365 and OneDrive. It's sophisticated phishing, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, they're trying to steal login credentials, for things like Office three hundred sixty five and OneDrive. It's sophisticated phishing, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The references to Sharepoint, email and Microsoft productivity tools indicated the hackers wanted to steal target passwords for those services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Sophisticated phishing. Right. So, like, Microsoft's own products are vulnerable, but they're the ones stopping the bad guys? That's rich.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sophisticated phishing. Right. So, like, Microsoft's own products are vulnerable, but they're the ones stopping the bad guys? That's rich.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: But they are stopping them! And, um, they also found a link to a prominent US political consulting firm, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they are stopping them! And, um, they also found a link to a prominent U S political consulting firm, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two targets appeared to be two think tanks: the International Republican Institute and the Hudson Institute.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? A US firm? Hold on, I thought this was, like, pure Russian evil. Now it's, uh, it's domestic too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? A U S firm? Hold on, I thought this was, like, pure Russian evil. Now it's, uh, it's domestic too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, it adds another layer, doesn't it? But it's all about undermining elections. Even Senator Claire McCaskill, a Democrat, was targeted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, it adds another layer, doesn't it? But it's all about undermining elections. Even Senator Claire McCaskill, a Democrat, was targeted.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Not long after, Senator Claire McCaskill, a Democrat in Missouri, confirmed she'd been a target of the Fancy Bear crew.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, were they successful? Or was it all just, like, a big scary noise for nothing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, were they successful? Or was it all just, like, a big scary noise for nothing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: They said there's no evidence the hackers were successful. But they're still, like, very concerned about the attempts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They said there's no evidence the hackers were successful. But they're still, like, very concerned about the attempts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Again, there was no evidence to suggest the hackers had been successful.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Concerned. Right. Sounds like, uh, some good old-fashioned PR for Microsoft, if you ask me. "Look at us, saving democracy from, uh, ourselves, maybe?"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Concerned. Right. Sounds like, uh, some good old-fashioned P R for Microsoft, if you ask me. Look at us, saving democracy from, uh, ourselves, maybe?
